mapper.select: select lc.lcid, to_char(lcday,'YYYY-MM-DD') lcdate, lcstart, lcend, lcstatus, lcteacher, lcplace,lcexplain, lcstudent,lckeyword,lcname,lcprice,lccount,lctexplain,lcimg from live_class lc left join live_class_img lci on lc.lcid = lci.lcid

select lc.lcid, to_char(lcday,'YYYY-MM-DD') lcdate,to_char(lcday,'dy') lcday , lcstart, lcend, lcstatus, lcteacher, lcplace,lcexplain,lcstudent, lckeyword,lcname,lcprice,lccount,lctexplain,lcimg from live_class lc left join live_class_img lci on lc.lcid = lci.lcid where lc.lcid=#{lcid}
select lc.lcid ,lcday, lcstart,lcend, lcstatus,lcname,lcimg from live_class lc right join class_list cl on lc.lcid = cl.lcid left join live_class_img lci on lci.lcid = cl.lcid where mid = #{mid}
